21#include "lib.h"
22
23
24
25//
26// Declare runtime functions
27//
28
29//
30//
31//
32
33INTN
34DbgAssert (
35 IN CONST CHAR8 *FileName,
36 IN INTN LineNo,
37 IN CONST CHAR8 *Description
38 )
39{
40 DbgPrint (D_ERROR, (CHAR8 *)"%EASSERT FAILED: %a(%d): %a%N\n", FileName, LineNo, Description);
41
42 BREAKPOINT();
43 return 0;
44}
